mapper.insert: INSERT INTO enterprise_inform( company_type, company_name, principal, address, informant, informant_number, lng, lat, total_number, risk_value, measure, major_danger, major_risk_name )VALUES( #{companyType}, #{companyName}, #{principal}, #{address}, #{informant}, #{informantNumber}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{totalNumber}, #{riskValue}, #{measure}, #{majorDanger}, #{majorRiskName} )
INSERT INTO influence_factor_details ( enterprise_id, category_id, determine_factor, score, photo ) VALUES ( #{enterpriseId}, #{categoryId}, #{determineFactor}, #{score}, #{photo} )
